name: Andrew McCabe
summary: Former FBI Deputy Director who was fired by Trump and later called Trump 'a threat to the rule of law' and warned he governs by 'chaos and division.'

keyStatements.quote: I think the president is a threat to the rule of law in this country. I think the president attacks the Justice Department and the FBI as a way of protecting himself.
The president and his followers have shown that they will say anything and do anything to undermine any investigation.
I think it's possible that Donald Trump was working on behalf of Russia.

timeline.significance: Called Trump threat to rule of law

credibility.background: Former FBI Deputy Director, 21-year FBI career, led counterterrorism and national security investigations
